comment.author: 93287303@N03
comment._content: Incorrectly identified. This is a DH-4M-2,not a DH-4M-1. This can be dertermined by looking at the two rear cabines between the top wing and the fuselage. The fuselage attach point is rearward of where the -1 would be. Note the rear cabines are not parallel with the frint ones. No doubt, a Fokker built DH-4 fuselage.
